title: Seated Figure
credit_line: Patrons Art Fund: gift of G. David Thompson
provenance_text:
William Scott [1913-1989], London, England [1]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1955 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 264 (illustrated, plate 98) in "The 1955 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1955. 
[2].The painting was purchased from the International for Carnegie Institute (through The British Council, London) with funds provided by Mr. G. David Thompson [1899-1965], Pittsburgh, PA.
